Description:
RARE OPPORTUNITY IN SOUGHT AFTER LOCATION
Located in this highly sought after position, within close proximity to Bendigo's CBD, is this outstanding property which comprises a three bedroom residence on a large 1600m2 (approx.) allotment. There are many options to explore and it's important to inspect first hand in order to appreciate that this is a truly outstanding location. You may wish to keep the existing home and extend to take advantage of the space out the back or land bank the area for later use or there's plenty of room to develop townhouses (STCA). The existing residence offers comfortable living and provides the added bonus of being able to provide a rental return for those who wish to hold the property for future development. With a large block of land plus easy access to the city centre of Bendigo, this property is packed with promise. Take the time to investigate as this is one out of the box.
Note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT INSPECTIONS

Address: 49 Havlin Street East Street Kennington VIC 3550
Description:
INNER CITY CHARM - PRIME LOCATION
You really must step inside to appreciate this gorgeous home, offering a great lifestyle, with proximity to the CBD and nothing to do except move in and relax. With no detail overlooked, this character filled three bedroom home is a refined residence set on a corner allotment.
The beautifully presented and instantly inviting interior has been carefully renovated for modern living, comprising 9ft ceilings throughout, master bedroom with walk-in robes and ensuite, two additional bedrooms, classic modern kitchen with the latest fixtures and fittings, 2 living rooms, family bathroom with spa, European laundry, ducted heating and 2 x split system air-conditioning units. Double wide sliding doors lead from the sunroom/office to your covered timber alfresco deck and rear yard with a quaint country garden.
Buyers will relish the fabulous location, overlooking Bendigo creek reserve, walking tracks and walking distance to all that the Bendigo CBD has to offer. If you're looking for character and flair in a convenient location this will be the house for you!!

Great First Home with large Garage/Workshop

L shaped Lounge: gas wall furnace & air conditioning unit
Master bedroom: air conditioning unit
Galley kitchen: gas stove and adjacent meals area

Garage/Workshop (9m x 4.5m approx.)
Close proximity to terrific schools, LaTrobe University, large Strathdale shopping complexes, Kennington Reservoir & parklands. Transport and only minutes into Bendigos CBD.
A perfect property for future gain & growth. Excellent value for occupier or entry-level investor.

Description:
MODERN FAMILY HOME IN POPULAR KENNINGTON LOCALE!
Perfectly positioned in one of Kenningtons popular tightly held streets, with no through road access it is quiet & peaceful. A playground close by & National Park offers walking tracks & nature.
You will be impressed with the modern contemporary home, kitchen & bathroom updates. Just a few blocks from the supermarkets and cafes at Kennington Village, and the picturesque Kennington Reservoir, this beautifully finished home is spacious and offers a fantastic, flexible design.
The corner allotment sprawls over 1619 sq.m, providing handy shed access accessed from Bambara Close, off-street parking, perfect for extra vehicles, caravan or boat. In addition to a circular driveway leading to the home / potential garage. The current owners have converted this into a family rumpus / games room / storage, however is easily converted back to a garage if desired.
The main entrance opens into a wide hallway, with a welcoming front lounge, this has a neat nook offering space to study. Each of the bedrooms are large with built in storage. The parents retreat, with ensuite & built in robes, it is light and bright.
The family bathroom, has been beautifully renovated. The home offers ample storage and is well appointed with ducted gas heating & evaporative cooling. At the rear of the house is an open plan kitchen, dining and access to the large undercover alfresco. The beautifully designed kitchen offers ample storage, including a pantry, gas hot plates & built in wine rack.
Large sliding doors from the living space open out to a fantastic entertaining space. This alfresco area includes a built-in barbeque with a sink perfectly fitted out to serve as a third living space. Such an entertainers home, a lovely surprise with even more space to relax by the pool. An outdoor rumpus room makes for a flexible extra living area.
The yard is completed by fruit trees, a home for the chooks, grass for the kids, access to the shed / garage. There are so many places to sit and relax in the sunshine.
Additional features include:
Evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating.
Storage in all bedrooms.
Side access to the shed / garage.
Great storage options.
Modern kitchen appliances.
18 Solar Panels, 4Kw system, 4.5 inverter.
Just immaculately presented, this fantastic property would be absolutely ideal for the entire family, what a lifestyle to live in & enjoy the surroundings. Close to all amenities and with a high-end finish, this property is ready to move into and enjoy.
Insights: 73 Marnie Road, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 26 other 4 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculately presented and close to amenities
Those looking to downsize, be close to universities and schools, set on a quiet court, close to public transport, University, schools and shopping precinct; this charming and immaculately presented two bedroom brick veneer unit oozes liveability and comfort with the use of open plan kitchen and living, along with the generous covered
outdoor alfresco area.
The kitchen features generous bench space, plentiful cupboards and an electric oven and cooktop. Each natural light-filled bedroom has built in wardrobes and ceiling fans, and the unit has a modern bathroom with separate shower, bath and vanity, along with a separate toilet.
The home is enhanced by soft grey carpet throughout the living areas and bedrooms as well as gas wall furnace and air conditioner for all year comfort.
The spacious, fully-covered outdoor alfresco area provides a comfortable and private spot to sit and relax, with the roof incorporating the undercover two car parking space. The property features a private and secure garden with a garden shed.
This charming and low maintenance unit won't last long in this high demand area of
Kennington.

Description:
IMMACULATE TOWNHOUSE IN PERFECT POSITION
Situated in a sought after location being close to the University, Kennington and Strath Village shopping centres while only being minutes to Bendigo's CBD is where you will find this fantastic brick veneer townhouse. This lovely low maintenance townhouse features three bedrooms, main with ensuite and WIR, light filled spacious lounge, kitchen/dining area with gas hot plates, electric oven and dishwasher, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry with excellent storage. The ducted heating and cooling will keep you comfortable all year round. Outside you will find a low maintenance garden along with a double garage with auto door. Ideally suited for the home owner whether that be your first home or the retiree looking to downsize or the investor who may be looking for an excellent investment.

Description:
Elevated 1960s Cream Brick Residence in Superb Location
Combining 1960s charm with modern functionality is this gorgeous and well-preserved family home, in an outstanding locale close to shops, schools and the Bendigo CBD. The home is a marvellous example of a cream brick home of its era, with 9ft ceilings, concrete stumps and a suspended slab to ensure its longevity.
Property features include:
Three spacious bedrooms, all with built in robes
Stunning polished timber floors throughout
Renovated bathroom with brand new vanity, shower, bath and separate toilet
Recently painted kitchen/meals area featuring new electric 4 burner ceramic cook top, overhead cupboards and restored bench tops
Large front lounge flooded with natural light boasting a lovely outlook over the neighbourhood
Split system heating and cooling, plus electric heat banks to all bedrooms
Generous and private allotment of 639m² with compact rear porch, side undercover alfresco area (currently used as a caravan port), single lockup garage with cellar or storage space, as well as a 3 x 4.5m workshop
Low maintenance, beautifully presented gardens
This property features all the quality of a 60s-built home, ready to move in and enjoy, or for the astute investor this property will ensure a great long-term return. Enquire now to book your private inspection.

Description:
QUIET AND PEACEFUL PLEASER
Retreat to quiet and comfort in this position perfect abode.
Leave the car at home and take a five minute walk to the nearby supermarket and shops or enjoy the fresh air strolling around Kennington Reservoir this unit allows you true ease of living.
Nestled at the back of a block of 5 units, this well-kept neat and tidy three bedroom two-bathroom home also offers a single car garage with additional parking space on your private gravel at the front.
Inside, you're greeted by your light and bright open plan living and dining area complimented by large bay windows.
Whip up a meal with ease in your fully equipped kitchen complete with all the essentials and corner pantry and easily maintain the home's climate all year round with ducted cooling and gas wall furnace.
Stepping outside through the glass sliding doors create your own tranquil area to enjoy your morning coffee and soak up the sun in the fully secure and part-paved backyard complete with shade sail and established garden.
Unique to this property is the extra space at the back of the garage making for the perfect study or guest room.
Master with ensuite, two spacious bedrooms and laundry with outside access make up this rest of this home.
Invest and bring in a rental income or settle in and make it your ideal comfortable home.

Description:
DELIGHTFUL ARCHITECT DESIGN
Uninterrupted northern light shines into almost every room of this architect-designed two-bedroom home in Kennington.
The split level design features two good-sized bedrooms, (BIR), located in a separate little wing beside the bathroom with a powder room for day/guest use.
Living areas feature raked ceilings with exposed beams throughout spacious open dining area and kitchen with electric cooking, dishwasher, corner pantry and appliance cupboard. The step-down lounge includes extensive built-in cabinetry and French doors to a private deck while
a tiled sun-drenched rear terrace overlooking the rear gardens is the ideal spot for alfresco dining with friends or just relaxing with a book under the wide eaves. Not only will it be your sanctuary, but a destination where family and friends can come together.
Extra features - separate laundry with good storage, double linen, gas heating, fresh paintwork and new floor coverings throughout
The compact allotment approx 524m² includes double carport at the front and garden/tool shed hidden away at the end of the garden.
Perfect for downsizers, retirees or investors, the residence is connected to the CBD by public transport and is only a short stroll from Kennington and Strath Village shopping centres with LaTrobe university, Kennington Reservoir and many other recreational facilities close by.

Description:
TENANTED WITH EXCEPTIONAL RETURN
This glorious double storey family home is in one of the most sought after areas with a unique design that will fit all needs. Currently tenanted until late 2019 with a rental return of $440 p/w, this property would suit an investor or a family seeking space and convenience; located less than five minutes drive to the centre of Bendigo, close to schools, shops, bus stops and more. Comprising of five bedrooms, all featuring reverse cycle split systems and built in robes. With a lovely light filled master bedroom with walk in robe and split system your assured year round comfort. Upstairs you will find the modern kitchen featuring gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher and ample cupboard space leading onto glass sliding door into the dining space which leads out to a spacious balcony overlooking Harry Trott Oval and the lovely foliage surrounds. Adjacent is the L-shape lounge including reverse cycle split system and gas heater that could be transformed into an entertainers dream space with access to the light filled sunroom. Down stairs is the laundry as well as a room that would be ideal for a kids play room, study or gymnasium. The options are endless! Add in the convenience of having a bathroom located on both levels of the home making getting ready for the day that much easier. Externally a driveway down one side of the house leads to a single carport and the low maintenance yard. This home is an absolute must to inspect!

Description:
TOWNHOUSE.
* Brick veneer detached townhouse.
* Near new condition.
* Two large bedrooms, both with built in robes.
* Three piece bathroom with separate toilet.
* European laundry and open plan kitchen/dining/lounge.
* Split system heating and cooling.
* Lock up single car garage.
* Low maintenance enclosed yard.
Very nicely presented low maintenance property, close to all amenities, walking distance to local primary school, La Trobe Uni and Strathdale shopping precinct. Public transport close by.
Contact agent to arrange an inspection.

Description:
CLASSY ST AIDANS PARK TOWNHOUSE
Superbly positioned within the St Aidans Park complex this spacious two-storey residence includes two ground-floor living areas with a light-filled lounge at the front off the welcoming entry. Polished hardwood floors and zoned reverse-cycle heating/cooling flow throughout with the second living/meals area adjoining the kitchen. It enjoys access to a north-facing timber alfresco deck overlooking the easy-care courtyard garden.
Well-equipped kitchen features granite bench top/breakfast bar, gas/electric cooking appliances, dishwasher and pantry.
A powder room and European-style laundry complete downstairs with three bedrooms, the family bathroom and a study nook all located upstairs.
Spacious main bedroom includes walk-in robe, ensuite and a sunny balcony with views over the expansive St Aidans Park gardens.
The property offers secure off-street parking in a rear-accessed double garage with auto roller door and visitor parking alongside.
Enjoy a carefree, low maintenance lifestyle with access to the beautiful communal gardens where you can soak up the sunshine or stroll among the greenery.
A car is not a necessity with the best of Strathdale shopping, parklands, Brennan Park pool, medical rooms, Kennington Reservoir and LaTrobe University all within easy walking or cycling distance and public transport handy for commuting to the city.
Guaranteed to impress - this is your chance to secure a sought-after lifestyle or a solid investment in a stunning environment.
Insights: 23/1 Edwards Road, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 74 other 3 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Its a Great Place to Start
This character filled solid 1940s California bungalow with 10ft ceilings is located in one of Bendigos most sought-after streets within an easy stroll to Bendigo CBD, Train Station, Marketplace Shopping Centre, Schools and Sporting Fields.
Forget all the other royals because this is the only Royal to concentrate on.
Restumped and freshly painted, but still allowing you the opportunity to add your own stamp to this home with most of the hard work already completed.
Inside Features:
Lovely Front porch
Tasmanian Oak Floorboards throughout
3 bedrooms
Plantation shutters to the two front rooms
Ducted Gas Heating
Ducted Evaporative Cooling
Large kitchen with electric stove
Large living room enjoying the afternoon sun
Open Fireplace to lounge
Outside features
Restumped
Driveway to rear shed
Established trees
Large yard for children and pets to play
Quiet location
At a most affordable price, this will be your opportunity to get into the property market and secure a fantastic home.
